summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by updating the shared dance style options list to include the required Bharatnatyam frequency text in the user-facing description. The diff also includes unrelated state/summary-file updates not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated project tracking entries (AR-1, AR-2) in project_state.json, marking feature requests as pending.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to update dropdown text in the frontend; it did not request changes to project tracking metadata/state files.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated frontend-file-summaries.txt with broad application feature descriptions (routes, Stripe, admin pages, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is narrowly scoped to updating the Bharatnatyam dropdown text; modifying a large summary file describing many unrelated features is not requested.
